this_title: Faceless Neil: Out Of The Darkness
trans_title: 无脸男尼尔： 冲出黑暗
introduction: Out of The Darkness is a short film extract from the feature screenplay of Faceless Neil's adventures. The short film aims to show what a feature length film would look like. In this film we discover the main 2 characters and are introduced to their universe
chinese_title: 无脸男尼尔： 冲出黑暗
foreign_title: Faceless Neil: Out Of The Darkness
